name: Quadrum
description:
When asked to make a shape, you must make a shape. Keep your eye on the time though. Click help for a run through of how to play the game.

This game uses the track Among, by Matt Mercer. You can hear more of his music at his soundcloud page.

IOS version coming soon.

There are gamejolt leaderboards, if you swing that way. Just click the notification at the top when the game starts, or go to the settings menu to log in.
